alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:23AM CST until February 17 at 12:45AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CALLAHAN...JONES...WESTERN SHACKELFORD AND NORTHERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 1221 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located just north of Abilene near Impact moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Abilene and Fort Phantom around 1230 AM CST. Hamby around 1235 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Impact, Hodges, Tuxedo, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Camp Butman, Kirby Lake, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 294. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
